text: Inhibition studies indicate that specific tyrosine phosphorylation following PTK activation is involved in the mobilization of the transcription factor , nuclear factor kappa B , and <extra_id_0> VCAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression .
This may have implications for pathophysiological conditions that involve the upregulation of these molecules ( e.g . inflammation and atherosclerosis ) .
